## Provide a brief title for your commit (keep it under 50 characters):

[Type]: Title


## Provide additional details or description about your commit (use spaces for indents):

Details:
 +
 -

### Fell free to use one of the following types and actions.
# ┌────────────┬──────────────┐
# │	✨feat     │              │
# │	🐛fix      │  🔥🩹Hfix    │
# │	♻️refactor │  🚀perf      │
# │	🔧chore    │  ⚙️config    │
# │	🧹cleanup  │  🎨style     │
# │	📚docs     │              │
# └────────────┴──────────────┘

# ┌────────────┬──────────────┐
# │	Add        │   Implement  │
# │	Change     │   Remove     │
# │	Fix        │   Update     │
# │	Refactor   │              │
# └────────────┴──────────────┘

### Use the following markers to indicate the changes you made:
# - [+] Added
# - [-] Deleted
# - [*] Changed
# - [/] Fixed
